Release ChangesÂ¶

v0.4.8 - rather large changes to classes - still running v0.4.5 in python2 installs will update that in 0.4.8 which will begin a release canidate for v0.5.0

v0.4.5 - minor packaging changes - added initial suppor for object reload based on age

v0.4.4 - Reorganized for easier packaging - Supporting both Python2 and Python3 in the installer - tox automated virtenv & tests for python 2.6, 2.7, 3.2 - Added command line monitoring script

v0.4.1 - Changing project name to better fit PyPi - Packaging as an installable module

v0.4 - Added basic nose test script - Refactored classes - Added Alerts() class - Optional json output (getting ready for web service/api) - Various code cleanup/improvements

v0.3.1 - bugfix only

v0.3: - refactored nagios plugin, it now uses (only) SAME code(s) - Moved SAME code related methods to new class which can be used without parsing an alerts feed.

v0.2: - moved master branch to python 3.x - maintaining python2.x branch

v0.1: - First tagged release
